name: Perfecto
description:
Hello! We are DofS Team, it is our first game. We learn game development for about 2 month and we would like to see your reaction. Our game not perfect but we think that it is cool as for the first game)

There are about 60 levels (why not)

Also you can visit our website: http://dofs.pp.ua/

Also we are from Ukraine so sorry for mistakes)
